title: IAlarmHandler10 (Interface)
text:
INTERFACE IAlarmHandler10 EXTENDS
IAlarmHandler9
This is an extension of the IAlarmHandler9 interface which provides functionality to
retrieve an alarm group or class by name and clearing the alarm history.
